title: Still cannot log in
body:
It has been nearly a month now that I cannot log in into League without using VPN :|

What actually happened? It keeps saying "An unexpected error occurred while logging in. Please try again. If this issue persists, contact support at support.riotgames.com".

Please fix :|

replies.body:
If you have to use a VPN to login, it usually points toward a routing issue to the login servers along your ISP's network infrastructure. We can take a look at your network routing after you've worked through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure all your local settings are good.

Let me know if you continue to experience login issues without a VPN after working through that guide.
BUMP, i get the same probelm in my main account! RITO PLZ HELP US{{champion:32}}
